code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import api from'../services/API';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoanDetails=()=>{const[loans,setLoans]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchLoans=async()=>{try{const response=await api.get('/loans');setLoans(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching loan details:",error);}};fetchLoans();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Loan Details"}),loans.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:loans.map(loan=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Amount: $",loan.amount,", Status: ",loan.status,", Due: ",loan.dueDate]},loan.id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No loan details available."})]});};export default LoanDetails;
